pages.text: $(li)Tropical Fish are common passive creatures that can be found in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/tropical_fish)Tropical Fish$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l) on death.
